commitResults.messageBody:
- add listen instance method to accept user input from commandline
- refactor main to call greet and goodbye in listen method

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for add and list tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
- Refactor "listen" instance method to use switch-case to determine command
- Add instance field ArrayList "tasks" to store tasks
- Add instance method "listTasks" to list all tasks
- Add instance method "addTask" to add tasks to private instance field "tasks"

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for mark as done
commitResults.messageBody:
- Create new class Task to abstract the behaviour and properties of task
- Add ability to split user input into command and arguments to support mark as done feature
- Add extra case statements to switch block in "listen" to handle "mark" and "unmark" commands
- Rename kuki to shinobu for clarity
- Convert instance field "tasks" from ArrayList<String> to ArrayList<Task> to support new Task class
- Modify listTasks to account for change in string representation of task
